## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in `/docs` (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not added new dependencies
- [ ] OR: New dependencies are justified and documented

### Security
- [ ] My code does not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not committed sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs (if applicable)
